bio: Moved from Sweden to Paris to follow my dreams 💫

location.location_name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel and Spa

list.comment: Despite yesterday’s stormy skies I had the most woooonderful birthday, celebrating turning another year older (but they say rain bring luck, no? 😂) with the loveliest experience ever at @Lareserveparis ♥️ I’m so touched by how much love they put into every single detail and how well we were taken care of! I think I found my Parisian balcony after all 😉😍
Trying to stay warm and cosy ☺️ I can’t believe that December is almost here already ❄️🙈 (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere)
“You’re exactly where you’re supposed to be” ✨

This night still seems unreal to me and I almost have to rewatch my own stories to understand what we just had the opportunity to experience ✨ Merci mille fois for making my birthday the most special ever @Diorparfums 💕 (And also, can I move in please?! 🙈) #maisonchristiandior

“Thé Cachemire” - The second part of this little series that we created for @Diorparfums, wearing a piece from the latest cruise collection by #MariaGraziaChiuri 💛 (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere) #maisonchristiandior
When you have a bad hair day: put a bow on it 👌🏻💙
Early Sunday morning right here, all by myself with a take-away coffee and wrapped up in a big cosy coat 😌❄️

location.location_name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel and Spa

list.comment: I guess this is what birthday dreams are made of... 😌✨ Thank you to everyone for making me feel so special on this day 💕 Psssst! And to be honest, it’s not over yet. I can’t wait (!) to show you what I’m up to tonight. It’s going to be magical 😍

When your brand new phone decides to give up on you for the second time within a month and you loose everything, you most definitely want to pull your own hair out 😂 Thank god I saved my old phone just in case 😅 Let me get back to you after this little hiccup 😓🙈
Favourite colour palette on repeat this autumn 🤗 (You can find all outfit details via the link in my bio) 💙
Lazy weekends 🖤
Trying to wrap my head around the fact that we’re already in November (and that I’m turning another year older next week 😱😅) and that autumn is in full swing over here right now 💛
Once upon a dream... ✨
November in Paris has never looked so good 🍂💛 (For all outfit details, tap the link in my bio)
Memories from the most magical evening ✨

En route to a little Monday cake party (aren’t those the best ones?! 😍) yesterday. But I plan on eating cake all week long since it’s my birthday tomorrow 🙈🍰 (For all outfit details you can visit the link in my bio)
Still very much in love with these Parisian streets 🧡
If I had a little Parisian balcony (or rather a green thumb 😅), I would also decorate it with pink flowers every single day 💕

When @Diorparfums want to throw you a birthday dinner, you say yes. This was the venue for last night’s festivities 😱 I will never be able to get over this night. Ever. I still have goosebumps all over 😭😍 It will be an evening I’ll remember forever ✨💕 #maisonchristiandior
Autumn colours in Jardin du Luxembourg 🍂💛
Can’t get enough of these wonderful autumn days 💛🍂
Strolls along the Seine 💙

Ever since I begun taking photos, created my website and got Instagram, it has forced me to pay attention to my surroundings even more than I did before. Yes, there are a lot of bad things to be said about always being connected and also about social media... But at the end of the day, I’m so unbelievably happy that I picked up my camera when I first moved to Paris, that I started this Instagram account and that I still keep taking photos of things and places that catches my eye 💙 It forces me to always pay attention, to always look up and look around me. It makes me see what I otherwise might have missed on my way... 😌 Just look at this tiny little house, wedged in between these beautiful buildings 😍 How adorable isn’t that?! Or those gorgeous Parisian windows on the right. Ahhh! I can only imagine what it looks like on the other side... ✨

“La Colle Noire” - A little something that we shot together with @Diorparfums last week (in what I also like to refer to as ‘apartment heaven’) 💕 And pssst! How good isn’t this @Dior suit?! 😍 (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere) #maisonchristiandior
Staying cosy during these sunny autumn days in Paris 🤗💛 (You can find all outfit details via the link in my bio)
Dreaming away... 😌💕

location.location_name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel and Spa

list.comment: This past year has included all sorts of ups and downs 😅 It hasn’t been all smooth sailing (despite what it might look like through Instagram photos haha). It’s actually been a bit of an emotional roller coaster... I’ve experienced some of my highest highs and some tougher moments as well. As I enter another year on this little planet I’m not sure of many things if I’m being completely honest... And I feel kind of clueless about what the future holds for me (which of course is very exciting in its own way) ✨☺️ But if there’s something I do know, it’s that I’m unbelievably happy for getting to celebrate turning another year older, for sharing so many wonderful moments with friends, having the most supportive family, good health, the opportunity to visit so many magical places and for having so many loved ones around me every single day ♥️ I can’t wait to see what comes my way as a 27-year-old 🤗

“Rose Gipsy” - The third and final part of this little series that we shot with @Diorparfums on Place Vendôme last week 💕 I will never be able to get over this crazy beautiful place and I wish that I could have this as the location for every single shoot in the future 😂🙈 (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere) #maisonchristiandior
November in Paris ♥️

Winter (I know, I know, it’s technically only autumn even though it feels like winter already 😅) whites with a little pop of velvet yellow 💛 Last week, en route to the opening of the new @Furla boutique out in La Vallée Village (I hope you caught my Stories for this adorable little place 😍) ✨ (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere) #thefurlasociety #ad

“What?! The sun is out?” *Drops everything and runs outside to the closest coffee place and doesn’t come back home until the sun has gone down*. Pretty much sums up my Tuesday 😅 You can’t miss a second of sunshine during this grey November weather 🙈💛
Put me on a Parisian terrace and I’ll be happy 😌💛

location.location_name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel and Spa

list.comment: Currently packing my bags and getting ready to leave Paris for a little weekend getaway 🤗 But never mind a weekend spent like this in Paris either I have to say... 🙈💛

location.location_name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel and Spa

list.comment: I’ve dreamt about a Parisian balcony of my own since they day I arrived here so you better believe that I will make the most of it (even in the grey weather ☁️😅) when one is given to me for a little while 😂 Eventually I had to enjoy the day-after-my-birthday-breakfast inside due to the chilly weather but luckily the inside of this place was just as beautiful as the outside 😍♥️
Sunny winter days are my favourite kind of winter days 💙
Memories from a warmer day 😌💛

Made it outside for a little while during this sunny and beautiful weekend in Paris but most of it was spent in bed with a sore throat and a runny nose - just as I’ll continue doing this Monday 😓 Any good Netflix series you guys can recommend?! I’m going through them by the minute 🙈 (I’m currently on the last episodes of Blacklist 😱)
Bienvenue chez moi! 💁🏼‍♀️✨ Haha yeah right, I wish 😅 (Photo: @journeyintolavillelumiere)
Memories from a weekend stroll 💛

Spending most of this weekend in my PJs with a runny nose, watching Netflix series and eating one too many macarons (I heard it’s good for sore throats, no?! 😉) so here’s one from earlier this week instead 🤗 ...Never thought white jeans were for me, but after finding this pair I just want more 😍💛
